I've been to many countries and love sharing my travel pictures and stories.
i work over 60 hours a week as a restaurant manager.
My most valued material possession is my journal, because it's a place where I can be honest with myself and explore my thoughts and feelings.
i have a garden.

i m looking forward to reading the latest political thriller.
I spend my days reading about politics and economics, and trying to understand how the world works.

content.text: I just got back from a trip to Europe, and I'm so excited to share all my pictures and stories with you!
I'm so jealous! I've always wanted to go to Europe. What was your favorite place?
I loved Italy the most. The food was amazing, and the people were so friendly.
I've heard great things about Italy. I've been wanting to go there for years.
You should definitely go! It's such a beautiful country.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, play baseball, and spend time with my friends and family.
I like to read too. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read political thrillers and historical fiction.
I've never read a political thriller, but I've heard they're good.
They are! They're really suspenseful and keep you on the edge of your seat.
I might have to check one out sometime.
You should! You might like it.
